title: Duke Zalto
contents: subtitle | Huge fire giant, lawful evil
property | Saving Throws | Dex +3, Con +10, Cha +5
description | Ring of Lightning Resistance | Duke Zalto has resistance to lightning damage.
description | Siege Monster | Duke Zalto deals double damage to objects and structures.
description | Legendary Resistance (1/Day) | When Duke Zalto fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
description | Tackle | When Duke Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
description | Multiattack | Duke Zalto makes two maul attacks .
description | Giant Iron Maul | Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
description | Rock | Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

description | | Duke Zalto can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and nly at the end of another creature's turn. Duke Zalto regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.
description | Detect | Duke Zalto makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
description | Maul Attack | Duke Zalto makes a maul attack.

description | Command Ally | Duke Zalto targets an ally he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see and hear the duke, it can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.
